body.p: I enclose petition of Jno O'Brien asking the remission of a fine and imprisonment. There is no doubt at all about the merit of the application. He ought not to have been punished, and is entitled to all the mercy you can show him. The signers are among our best people

Very respectfully & truly
your friend
A. Duvall
I concur in the above recommendation
